Package net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify

Class HoldingsModifier

java.lang.Object
net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier
public class HoldingsModifier extends Object
Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings.
Since:
0.1.2.0
Author:
creatorfromhell

  • Constructor Details

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(String region, UUID currency, BigDecimal modifier)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The currency to use for the modification.
      modifier - The amount we are utilizing to modify the holdings. This may be negative to take the holdings down.

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(String region, UUID currency, PercentBigDecimal modifier)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The currency to use for the modification.
      modifier - The amount we are utilizing to modify the holdings. This may be negative to take the holdings down.

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(String region, UUID currency, BigDecimal modifier, Identifier id)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The currency to use for the modification.
      modifier - The amount we are utilizing to modify the holdings. This may be negative to take the holdings down.
      id - The Identifier for the holdings type to perform this transaction on.

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(String region, UUID currency, PercentBigDecimal modifier, Identifier id)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The currency to use for the modification.
      modifier - The amount we are utilizing to modify the holdings. This may be negative to take the holdings down.
      id - The Identifier for the holdings type to perform this transaction on.

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(HoldingsEntry entry)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      entry - The holdings entry to populate this modifier from.

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(String region, UUID currency, BigDecimal modifier, HoldingsOperation operation)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The currency to use for the modification.
      modifier - The amount we are utilizing to modify the holdings. This may be negative to take the holdings down.
      operation - The operation that should be performed with the modifier.

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(String region, UUID currency, BigDecimal modifier, HoldingsOperation operation, Identifier id)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      region - The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
      currency - The currency to use for the modification.
      modifier - The amount we are utilizing to modify the holdings. This may be negative to take the holdings down.
      operation - The operation that should be performed with the modifier.
      id - The Identifier for the holdings type to perform this transaction on.

    • HoldingsModifier

      public HoldingsModifier(HoldingsEntry entry, HoldingsOperation operation)
      Represents an object that may be utilized to modify an account's holdings. This class is able to then be applied directly to the holdings of an account.
      Parameters:
      entry - The holdings entry to populate this modifier from.
      operation - The operation that should be performed with the modifier.

  • Method Details

    • counter

      public HoldingsModifier counter()
      Returns a new HoldingsModifier object that is the opposite in terms of amount from this one.
      Returns:
      The new opposite holdings modifier object.

    • counter

      public HoldingsModifier counter(Identifier type)
      Returns a new HoldingsModifier object that is the opposite in terms of amount from this one.
      Parameters:
      type - The Identifier for the holdings type to perform this transaction on.
      Returns:
      The new opposite holdings modifier object.

    • isRemoval

      public boolean isRemoval()
      Used to determine if this modifier is used to remove froms.
      Returns:
      True if this will remove funds, otherwise false.
